title.rendered: How to Choose a Qualified Tax Preparer

content.rendered: Working with a qualified tax preparer can lessen the likelihood of delays and mistakes when you file. What makes a tax preparer qualified? Lead Tax Attorney Philip Hwang and CEO David King discuss tips for choosing your tax preparer. The Tax Show hosts cover types of tax professionals, credentials, minimum requirements, and red flags to look out for. Tune in to learn how to choose the best tax preparer for your tax situation.
